turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I want to order some coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where do you want to order coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peet's Coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Peet's on Park Street in Alameda

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cafe au lait

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What dairy product would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Non-fat milk, 2% milk, whole milk, soy milk, or almond milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any other requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can they make it with caramel syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can they put in double milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. How would you like to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With my account on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, the order has been submitted.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
